home.title: Sleep Test
home.pitch: Answer 30 questions in 5–10 minutes — get a free, clear report with explanations and practical actions.

card.title: Anonymous and 100% free
card.text: We take GDPR personally: no registration, no logging, no cost — all anonymous.

card.title: Compare
card.text: You get an ID after the test. Take it again later and compare what changed.

compare.help: Have your previous ID? Enter both to see progress — and where.
compare.notfound: Could not find one or both IDs.
compare.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

card.title: Learn more
card.text: Short articles about sleep, for everyone.

about.title: Created by the team at DMZ DATA AS

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.li1: The page does not collect, store, or share any personal data. You are 100% anonymous; only a unique ID is stored with a summary of the results in a database.

pattern.too_short: I sleep less than I need most nights.
pattern.irregular_times: My sleep times vary a lot from day to day.
pattern.late_long_naps: I take long or late naps that disturb the night.

insomnia.long_sleep_onset: It takes me a long time to fall asleep after going to bed.
insomnia.frequent_awakenings: I wake up several times during the night.
insomnia.early_morning_awakenings: I wake too early and can’t get back to sleep.
insomnia.unrefreshed_mornings: I don’t feel refreshed in the morning.
insomnia.daytime_impact: My sleep problems affect my daytime functioning (mood, focus, energy).

quality.overall_poor: My overall experience of sleep is poor.
quality.dissatisfied: I am dissatisfied with my sleep.
quality.restless_nights: My nights are often restless (nightmares, restlessness, pain).

daytime.doze_easily: I doze easily in calm situations (TV, reading, passenger).
daytime.struggle_stay_awake: I struggle to stay awake when I must concentrate.
daytime.tired_most_day: I fight tiredness for large parts of the day.

hygiene.screens_before_bed: I use screens right before bedtime.
hygiene.late_caffeine: I drink coffee/energy drinks late in the day.
hygiene.big_meal_late: I eat large meals late in the evening.
hygiene.hard_exercise_late: I exercise hard right before bedtime.

env.too_light_noise_temp: The bedroom is often too bright, noisy or the wrong temperature.
env.uncomfortable_bed: The bed or pillow is uncomfortable.
env.bad_associations: I work/watch TV in bed and get poor sleep associations.

breathing.observed_apneas: Others have observed breathing pauses when I sleep.
breathing.daytime_tired_despite: I’m very sleepy in the daytime even after a normal night.

f.sleep_hours: Sleep hours per night (last week average)

flags.osa_signal: Possible signs of sleep apnea – consider talking to your doctor.
flags.excessive_sleepiness: Marked daytime sleepiness – be extra careful.
